snippet: Ri Jong Chol, a suspect in the murder of the estranged half-brother of North Korea's leader, said in Beijing that he was a victim of a conspiracy by Malaysian authorities attempting to damage the honor of North Korea....

headline.main: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget
headline.print_headline: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget

lead_paragraph: Ri Jong Chol, a suspect in the murder of the estranged half-brother of North Korea's leader, said in Beijing that he was a victim of a conspiracy by Malaysian authorities attempting to damage the honor of North Korea.
